title.rendered: Henry Kissinger persistently promoted violence, opposed human rights, committed war crimes

content.rendered:
For decades the U.S. government — and compliant mainstream news media — pretended that Henry Kissinger was a great diplomat, when actually he was the opposite.  He PERSISTENTLY promoted violence, opposed human rights, and committed war crimes.

Now after he died on Nov. 29, 2023, at the age of 100, some people are reporting the truth about him.

 

Henry Kissinger, America’s Most Notorious War Criminal, Dies At 100.  The titan of American foreign policy was complicit in millions of deaths — and never showed remorse for his decisions. https://www.huffpost.com/entry/henry-kissinger-dies_n_6376933ae4b0afce046cb44f?email_hash=d82661dbaf9d922be74896a49d247c55ffc55d54

Henry Kissinger was a war criminal:  https://www.rawstory.com/henry-kissinger-war-criminal/

This article summarizes how horrible Kissinger was:  https://www.commondreams.org/further/good-fucking-riddance-kissinger-finally-kicks-his-bucket-of-blood)

Kissinger was a horrible war criminal:  https://www.motherjones.com/politics/2023/05/henry-kissinger-at-100-still-a-war-criminal/

Dead at 100, Henry Kissinger Leaves Behind a Bloody Legacy.  From Argentina to East Timor, his actions led to hundreds of thousands of deaths. https://www.motherjones.com/politics/2023/11/henry-kissinger-dead-at-100/

Kissinger was an extreme Cold Warrior:  https://jacobin.com/2023/11/henry-kissinger-cold-war-foreign-policy?mc_cid=154ff11f0c&mc_eid=193702481e

Kissinger was responsible for millions of deaths.  “Few people … have had a hand in as much death and destruction, as much human suffering, in so many places around the world as Henry Kissinger.”  https://theintercept.com/2023/11/29/henry-kissinger-death/

Kissinger and the CIA in Chile: An Interview With Peter Kornbluh, Part I:  A comprehensive review of the U.S. role in the 1973 coup of Salvador Allende and its aftermath:  https://www.truthdig.com/articles/kissinger-and-the-cia-in-chile-an-interview-with-peter-kornbluh/

War Criminal Henry Kissinger Was a Hero to Media Elites.  The media establishment finds itself heaping praise upon the “noted statesman” despite his enduring legacy as an indefatigable war criminal.  https://www.truthdig.com/articles/henry-kissinger-a-hero-to-media-elites/

While elites liked Kissinger, he actually was a war criminal:  https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2023/nov/29/henry-kissinger-dies-secretary-of-state-richard-nixon?link_id=9&can_id=e62e762c26877f0fe538cb355533a954&source=email-gops-hunter-biden-crusade-blows-up-in-their-faces&email_referrer=email_2129717&email_subject=maga-congressman-makes-deadly-threat-on-camera

Henry Kissinger’s legacy is unique (and that’s not a compliment):  https://www.dailykos.com/stories/2023/12/1/2208903/-Abbreviated-Pundit-Roundup-Henry-Kissinger-s-legacy-is-unique-and-that-s-not-a-compliment?detail=emaildkre&pm_source=DKRE&pm_medium=email

Kissinger actually prevented peace in the Middle East:  https://theintercept.com/2023/11/30/henry-kissinger-israel-egypt-soviet-union/

Survivors of Kissinger’s secret war in Cambodia reveal mass killings:  https://theintercept.com/2023/05/23/henry-kissinger-cambodia-bombing-survivors/
